org.interpss.numeric.sparse.base
Interface SparseEquation

All Known Subinterfaces:
SparseEqnComplex, SparseEqnDouble, SparseEqnInteger, SparseEqnMatrix2x2, SparseEqnObject<TAij,TBi>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSparseEqnDouble, AbstractSparseEqnDoubleNative, AbstractSparseEquation, AbstractSparseEquation, SparseEqnComplexImpl, SparseEqnComplexNativeImpl, SparseEqnDoubleCommonMathImpl, SparseEqnDoubleImpl, SparseEqnDoubleNativeImpl, SparseEqnIntegerImpl, SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl, SparseEqnMatrix2x2NativeImpl
public interface SparseEquation

Base Sparse Equation for solving sparse matrix problems.

increaseDimension

void increaseDimension()
Increase matrix dimension by 1. B[n] = 0.0, aii(n)=1.0, aij(n)=0.0

Parameters:

setB2Zero

void setB2Zero()

reset

void reset()
Reset the matrix to zero - set all aii and bi to 0.0 and clear the sparse structure, and release memory if necessary

setToZero

void setToZero()
Reset all matrix element to zero, preserve the matrix sparse structure.

getZeroAii_row

int getZeroAii_row()
During the LU process, aii might be zero. An exception will be thrown. This function is for getting zero aii row number for error reporting

Returns:
the row number
